1: “If it had not been the Lord who was on our side,” Let Israel now say—
2: “If it had not been the Lord who was on our side, When men rose up against us,
3: Then they would have swallowed us alive, When their wrath was kindled against us;
4: Then the waters would have overwhelmed us, The stream would have [a]gone over our soul;
5: Then the swollen waters Would have [b]gone over our soul.”
6: Blessed be the Lord, Who has not given us as prey to their teeth.
7: Our soul has escaped as a bird from the snare of the [c]fowlers; The snare is broken, and we have escaped.
8: Our help is in the name of the Lord, Who made heaven and earth.
